description: This view contains weekly rollups by service/team

schema.name: week
schema.description: The start of the week in 'YYYY-mm-dd' format

schema.name: team
schema.description: The internal ID of the Samsara product

schema.name: service
schema.description: An identifier for the type of usage this is. This helps identify what kind of job this is and where it comes from.

schema.name: total_cost
schema.description: The total cost for this service over the week.
